# acre

𓄿 𓎡 𓂋 𓆙 earth-gods ⇔ KUR

𒆻 agar3 | #ugāru Acker “meadow”

𒌑𒅥 u₂gu₇ (Kuh)Acker acre 𒅗 KA KIR₄ KU₂ GU₃ ZU₂

𒂠 eše2 Ecke (area) ⇔ acre

𒀳 #ikkaru Ackerer 𒈬𒌦𒃼 man@acker 𒀳 ᶠURU: furrow, farmer ֆերմեր fermer ფერმერი permeri 𒀳 ᶠURU > ᶠULU فَلَّاح fallāḥ fellow farmer

𒅅 ⇔ 𒂊 eg₂ •Ecke Egge 𒂊𒈬 Hecke Hagen •hark hergian harrow @ acre

𒅅𒅗𒊒 ik-ka-ru √Acker(mann)
𒅅𒅗𒊒 farmer, plowman

𒅅𒇻 eq-lu •ek-ru acre Hagen
𒅅𒇻 field

𒀀𒁕𒅈 a-da-ar "meadow"

𐀀-𐀒-𐀫 a-ko-ro field, country
